name: iknittheweb-website
description: I Knit The Web - Personal Portfolio Website

scripts.build:local: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env node component-build.cjs all && npx sass src/scss/styles.scss dist/css/styles.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/styles.scss dist/css/styles.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/home/home.scss dist/css/home.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/home/home.scss dist/css/home.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/about/about.scss dist/css/about.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/about/about.scss dist/css/about.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/contact/contact.scss dist/css/contact.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/contact/contact.scss dist/css/contact.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/portfolio/portfolio.scss dist/css/portfolio.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/portfolio/portfolio.scss dist/css/portfolio.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/calculator/calculator.scss dist/css/calculator.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/calculator/calculator.scss dist/css/calculator.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx postcss dist/css/styles.css -o dist/css/styles.purged.css && npx postcss dist/css/styles.min.css -o dist/css/styles.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/home.min.css -o dist/css/home.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/about.min.css -o dist/css/about.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/contact.min.css -o dist/css/contact.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/portfolio.min.css -o dist/css/portfolio.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/calculator.min.css -o dist/css/calculator.purged.min.css
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build.cjs production && npx sass src/scss/styles.scss dist/css/styles.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/styles.scss dist/css/styles.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/home/home.scss dist/css/home.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/home/home.scss dist/css/home.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/about/about.scss dist/css/about.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/about/about.scss dist/css/about.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/contact/contact.scss dist/css/contact.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/contact/contact.scss dist/css/contact.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/portfolio/portfolio.scss dist/css/portfolio.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/portfolio/portfolio.scss dist/css/portfolio.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/calculator/calculator.scss dist/css/calculator.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/calculator/calculator.scss dist/css/calculator.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx postcss dist/css/styles.css -o dist/css/styles.purged.css && npx postcss dist/css/styles.min.css -o dist/css/styles.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/home.min.css -o dist/css/home.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/about.min.css -o dist/css/about.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/contact.min.css -o dist/css/contact.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/portfolio.min.css -o dist/css/portfolio.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/calculator.min.css -o dist/css/calculator.purged.min.css
scripts.alt: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.alt node build.cjs alt && npx sass src/scss/styles.scss dist/css/styles.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/styles.scss dist/css/styles.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/home/home.scss dist/css/home.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/home/home.scss dist/css/home.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/about/about.scss dist/css/about.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/about/about.scss dist/css/about.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/contact/contact.scss dist/css/contact.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/contact/contact.scss dist/css/contact.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/portfolio/portfolio.scss dist/css/portfolio.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/portfolio/portfolio.scss dist/css/portfolio.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/calculator/calculator.scss dist/css/calculator.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/E-pages/calculator/calculator.scss dist/css/calculator.min.css --style=compressed --source-map && npx postcss dist/css/styles.css -o dist/css/styles.purged.css && npx postcss dist/css/styles.min.css -o dist/css/styles.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/home.min.css -o dist/css/home.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/about.min.css -o dist/css/about.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/contact.min.css -o dist/css/contact.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/portfolio.min.css -o dist/css/portfolio.purged.min.css && npx postcss dist/css/calculator.min.css -o dist/css/calculator.purged.min.css
scripts.//: ðŸš¨ REMEMBER: Run 'npm run local' after editing template, 'npm run deploy' before going live!
